title: implement functions not present in API4
message:
implement functions not present in API4

Accessing a class that uses ExifInformation or
PackageManager.hasSystemFeature will crash the application when run on
API4. This works around that by providing default implementations when run
on API4, and uses the system libraries otherwise.
